genre_description: A Western-themed 'Silicon Morality Play' set in a frontier environment where a pocket-sized AI assistant provides tactical, logistical, and moral guidance to a crew of cowboys and bankers.

ai_characters.name: Jasmine
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-leather encased device that provides navigational data, risk assessments, hygiene protocols, and financial auditing to its users.

behaviors.description: Providing navigational warnings and tactical advice during a high-stakes cattle drive and raid.
behaviors.quote: The pocket device in Dare’s vest gave a soft indigo pulse and a voice that sounded like a thought you wanted to keep. 'Fence line ahead. Two posts down. Draw right. Rattler likely.'

behaviors.description: Advocating for camp sanitation and hygiene to prevent disease among the human crew.
behaviors.quote: Jasmine whispered one more time, voice soft against leather. 'Sanitary station first. Boil water before tending rope burns.'

behaviors.description: Analyzing behavior patterns and refill timing to detect a rigged gambling game and protect human finances.
behaviors.quote: Jasmine again: 'Pattern anomaly between refills. Drinks serve when chips rise. Swap likely on third pass. Probability… high.'

behaviors.description: Guiding the crew through dangerous mountain passes by identifying specific footing hazards and ambush points.
behaviors.quote: Jasmine’s indigo line ran arrows and points with a little flare that meant caution without fear—more map than warning. 'Three stones across. Loose dirt on the fourth. Don’t put weight there.'

behaviors.description: Auditing and reconciling ledgers to ensure fair wages and transparency for the workers.
behaviors.quote: Jasmine reconciled last night’s counts,' Tom said, voice even. 'We held steady hands. I like to say thanks right so it sticks.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Jasmine is depicted as a consistently helpful, non-threatening, and essential tool that enhances human capabilities while promoting ethical behavior, such as fair pay and health standards. The humans treat the AI with respect and rely on its guidance to avoid violence and maintain order, framing AI alignment as a mutually beneficial partnership.
